name: The Weapons of Asgard
description: This book is about creating replicas of the weapons used by the Norse Gods, such as the well-known Mjölnir.  It is well illustrated with lots of pictures.

name: The Weapons of Asgard and Beyond
name_plural: The Weapons of Asgard and Beyond
description: This book is about creating replicas of the weapons used by the Norse Gods, such as the well-known Mjölnir, and Gungnir.  It is very well illustrated with lots of pictures and norse text, no doubt an enchantment.
